"Prize Exchange and CC limit": "You can use Casino Coins to exchange for luxurious prizes at the Prize Exchange Counter! <yellow>There are fixed exchange rates for prize classes, some prizes are available for a limited time, and some can only be exchanged a limited number of times.<c>"

"Your Casino Coins are automatically withdrawn and deposited when you enter and leave the Casino.

If you leave the Casino Area, but have more Casino Coins than the CC limit, the excess coins will be lost. (Casino Coin limit is 30,000 CC). If you do wish to leave the casino after going over the CC limit, you should buy a prize first, so your coins are not wasted."
